title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 22, subtit. B, ch. IV, subch. A, art. 1, subart. A, pt. 608 - Practice Of Law By Organizations And Professional Service Corporations
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 22, subtit. B, ch. IV, subch. A, art. 1, subart. A, pt. 608 - Practice Of Law By Organizations And Professional Service Corporations

State Regulations
§ 608.1 - Practice of law by organizations pursuant to Judiciary Law, sections 495 and 496
§ 608.2 - Practice of law by professional service corporations pursuant to Business Corporation Law, section 1514

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 22, subtit. B, ch. IV, subch. A, art. 1, subart. A, pt. 608

Statutory authority: Judiciary Law, §§495, 496

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
